meta.name: dc:Publisher
meta.content: Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania

p.span: Praise Jah! א [Aleph] I will praise Jehovah with all my heartב [Beth]In the assembled group of upright ones and in the congregation.
2 The works of Jehovah are great;ד [Daleth]They are studied by all those finding pleasure in them.
3 His activity is glorious and splendid,ו [Waw]And his righteousness endures forever.
4 He causes his wonderful works to be remembered. ח [Heth] Jehovah is compassionate and merciful.
5 Food he gives to those fearing him. י [Yod] He remembers his covenant forever.
6 He has revealed to his people his powerful worksל [Lamed]By giving them the inheritance of the nations.
7 The works of his hands are truth and justice;נ [Nun]Trustworthy are all his orders.
8 They are always reliable, now and forever;ע [Ayin]They are made in truth and righteousness.
9 He has given redemption to his people. צ [Tsade] He commanded that his covenant should last forever. ק [Qoph] His name is holy and awe-inspiring.
10 The fear of Jehovah is the beginning of wisdom. ש [Sin] All those observing his orders show good insight. ת [Taw] His praise endures forever.
